description: An activity that changes inputs into outputs, by transforming or transporting economic resource(s).

name.description: An informal or formal textual identifier for the process.

plannedWithin.description: Reference to a vf.planning.plan this process is part of.

hasBeginning.description: The planned or actual beginning date/time.

hasEnd.description: The planned or actual ending date/time.

finished.description: The process is complete or not. Default false.

inScopeOf.description: The agent in whose context the process is executed.

hasInput.description: References to all input flows (vf.observation.economicEvent, vf.planning.commitment, or vf.planning.intent) of this process.

hasOutput.description: References to all output flows (vf.observation.economicEvent, vf.planning.commitment, or vf.planning.intent) of this process.

note.description: Any useful textual information about the process.
